page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: { {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY FAMILY} My family get up at 8a.m. We have cornflakes. We get our shoes on. We walk to school. My dad works at Sterling Winthrop. They make medicine and pills. My mum works at Alnwick South School at night time so my Aunty Avril looks after me till 5.00p.m. My dad comes home then and I get changed for Cubs. At 7.00p.m. I go home and I go to bed. My dad and mum watch television or the video or work on the computer and go to bed later. My Uncle Nathan works at the pit. There are two different shifts, day and night shifts. They go on a blue bus. The police don't go with them any more because the strike is over. But people don't use as much coal as they used to because of electricity gas and oil. We have gas.
